amendatorysection.catchline: Witness fees; criminal cases in district court; by whom paid.
amendatorysection.para: The fees of all witnesses in criminal cases in the district court shall be paid by the county where the indictment is found.

annotation.para: Section does not create new liability on county. Hewerkle v. Gage County, 14 Neb. 18, 14 N.W. 549 (1883).
